Goldy Core Class#

class GoldyBot.goldy.Goldy(token: Token | None = None, raise_on_extension_loader_error=None)[source]#

Bases: object

The main Goldy Bot class that controls the whole framework and let‚Äôs you start an instance of Goldy Bot. Also known as the core.

command_listener#

Class that handles the invoking of commands.

command_loader#

Class that handles command loading.

config#

Class that allows you to retrieve configuration data from the goldy.json config file.

All properties return None when not found in the config.

database#

Goldy Bot‚Äôs class to interface with a Mongo Database asynchronously.

extension_loader#

Class that handles extension loading.

extension_reloader#

Class that handles extension reloading.

live_console#

The goldy bot live console.

async pre_setup()[source]#

Method ran before actual setup. This is used to fetch some data from discord needed by goldy when running the actual setup.

presence#

Class that allows you to control the status, game activity and more of Goldy Bot

async setup()[source]#

Method ran to set up goldy bot.

start()[source]#

üß°üåÜ Awakens Goldy Bot from her hibernation. üò¥ Shortcut to asyncio.run(goldy.__start_async()) and also handles various exceptions carefully.

stop(reason: str = 'Unknown Reason')[source]#

Shuts down goldy bot right away and safely incase anything sussy wussy is going on. üò≥

GoldyBot.goldy.get_core() → Goldy | None#

Returns instance of goldy core class.

GoldyBot.goldy.get_goldy() → Goldy | None#

Returns instance of goldy core class.

GoldyBot.goldy.get_goldy_instance() → Goldy | None[source]#

Returns instance of goldy core class.

Goldy Config#

class GoldyBot.goldy.goldy_config.GoldyConfig[source]#

Bases: Config

Class that allows you to retrieve configuration data from the goldy.json config file.

All properties return None when not found in the config.

property allowed_guilds: List[Tuple[str, str]]#

Returns list of tuples including guild id and guild code name that are allowed to operate in goldy bot.

property ding_on_exit: bool#

Returns whether goldy bot should play a ding sound effect on exit or not.

property extension_folder_location: str#

Returns location set for the extension folder in goldy.json.

property ignored_extensions: List[str]#

Returns code name of all ignored extensions from goldy.json.

property raise_on_extension_loader_error: bool#

Returns whether the extension loader should raise on load errors stopping the entire framework or not.

WATCHING = 3#
class GoldyBot.goldy.presence.Presence(goldy: Goldy)[source]#

Bases: object

Class that allows you to control the status, game activity and more of Goldy Bot

async change(status: Status | str = None, activity: Activity = None, afk: bool = None) → None[source]#

Updates the presence of Goldy Bot. Like e.g online, idle, dnd.

class GoldyBot.goldy.presence.Status(value)[source]#

Bases: Enum

Goldy Bot enum class of discord status.

AWAY = 'idle'#
DND = 'dnd'#
DO_NOT_DISTURB = 'dnd'#
IDLE = 'idle'#
INVISIBLE = 'invisible'#
ONLINE = 'online'#

get_token_from_env() → Tuple[str | None, str | None][source]#

Returns tuple of tokens from a .env file.

Tuple index order:

  • Discord Bot Token

  • MongoDB Token
